dc_title_s: Geologic atlas of Pope County, Minnesota, C-15, Part B, Plate 9, Sensitivity to Pollution of the Buried Aquifers
dc_description_s: Map showing the susceptibility of ground water in the buried unconsolidated sediment aquifers to contamination, including the age of the water as determined from radioactive isotopes in the water, scale 1:150,000, Pope County.
dc_publisher_s: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources, Division of Waters
